name: Quad Window Station
description:
Stainless steel, gun metal chain, 28" total length.
 
Handmade in Seattle.

name: Large Medallion Tassel
description:
Stainless steel, 18"  gun metal chain, 5.5" charm tassel length with seed chain detail.
 
Handmade in Seattle.

name: Snowflake Buckle
description:
A fresh design for the winter, here is the Snowflake Buckle. This listing is for the buckle only, however it is shown on both the plum and grass leather belts, also available separately here on my shop.
The snowflake buckle measures 3" by 1.5" and fits onto a 1.5" belt.
It is hand riveted, welded and burnished to a lovely finish.
Low profile, but high style!

name: Clover Triple Small Solo Station
description:
Stainless steel, gun metal chain, 26" total length.
 
Handmade in Seattle.

name: Radiator Belt Buckle
description:
Constructed from steel, this buckle has a pattern of quatrefoils that have been hand riveted to the back plate.
It measures 3" by 2.25" and is a great weekend buckle, lightweight but makes a strong statement.
Belts are sold separately on this store.

name: Clover Triple Large Solo Station
description:
Stainless steel, seed and smooth gun metal chain, 26" total length.
 
Handmade in Seattle.

name: BRASS Lens Buckle
description: Eclipsing brass plated steel rings create this ocular buckle.  This is one of the most popular buckles at STS, and can be worn in a variety of ways. Measures 3" in diameter, fits 1.5" belt.

name: Avion Tassel
description:
Stainless steel, 18" chain, 7" total charm tassel length.

Handmade in Seattle.

name: Black Italian Leather Belt
description:
This is a listing for the snap attach LEATHER STRAP ONLY. I make each of these straps entirely by hand, cutting the straps from ITALIAN LATIGO hide, punching the holes, skiving the leather, beveling and dying the edge. I attach heavy duty snaps. The leather is thick- 9 oz and strong, and wears beautifully. The snaps mean you can swap a different buckle on and off, and get more use out of your 1.5" wide belt. 

And custom sizes cost NO additional charge, please email for exact shipping times for custom sizes.

name: Descending Windsor Tassel
description:
Stainless steel, 20"stainless steel chain, 5" total charm tassel length.


Handmade in Seattle.

description:
Stainless steel with seed and smooth gun metal chain, 26" total length.


Handmade in Seattle.

description:
Stainless steel, gun metal chain, 26" total length.

description:

28" total length.

Handmade in Seattle

description:

name: Deco Clover Mirror Beaded
description:
Stainless steel, stainless steel chain, Czech and French glass seed beads in lavender, black, grey, and periwinkle. 32" total length.

Handmade in Seattle

name: Descending Clover Tassel
description:
Stainless steel, 18" gun metal chain, 4" total length charm tassel with seed chain detail.

name: Medallion Snake Beaded Station
description:
Stainless steel, gun metal chain, Czech and French glass seed beads in matte black, red, periwinkle and aqua.
29" total length

name: Asterix Tassel

description:

Handmade in Seattle.

name: Medallion Beaded Warm Station
description:

Stainless steel, gunmetal chain, 26" total length.

description:
Stainless steel, gun metal chain, 26" total length.

description:
Stainless steel, seed and smooth gun metal chain, 28" total length.

description:
Stainless steel,  10 strand seed gun metal chain, smooth gun metal chain, 24" total length.

name: Clover Tassel Earrings
description:
Stainless steel, gun metal chain, french hook earring with stoppers, 3" total length.

name: Clover Seed Tassel
description:
Stainless steel, seed and smooth gun metal chain, 18" total chain length, 5.5" total charm tassel length.
 
Handmade in Seattle.

name: Clover Smooth Tassel
description:
Stainless steel, gun metal chain, 18" total chain length, 5.5" total charm tassel length.
 
Handmade in Seattle.

name: Small Mosaic Tassel
description:
Stainless steel, 20" smooth gun metal chain,  5" total charm tassel length.
 
Handmade in Seattle.

name: Descending Mosaic Tassel
description:
Stainless steel, 18" gun metal chain,  7" total charm tassel length.
 
Handmade in Seattle.

name: Descending Medallion Tassel
description:
Stainless steel, 18" gun metal chain, 6.5" total charm tassel length.
 
Handmade in Seattle.

name: Small Medallion Tassle
description:
Stainless steel, 19" smooth gun metal chain,  5" total charm tassel length with seed chain detail.


Handmade in Seattle.

name: Avion Large Earring
description:
Stainless steel, silver french ear wire, 1.75" length.

Second photo shows large and small for scale.

Handmade in Seattle.

name: Brass Cat Buckle
description: Title says it  all, brass cat buckle, fits a 1.5" belt. Meow.

name: Brass American Gothic Buckle
description: Show your pioneer, backyard farm spirit with this pitchfork and shovel buckle. Hand fabricated from steel, then plated and hand finished in brass, the buckle fits a 1.5" strap, sold separately.

name: Brass Colt Buckle
description:
Modern, western, and in some ways, retro, this sweet horse buckle will rock your pants like an early Stones tune. 
Fits a 1.5" belt.

name: Brass Lone Star
description:
A bold combo of star and stripes, highlighted with  a striking brass finish, this buckle holds down the pants fort with style.
Hand fabricated from steel and then brass plated, the brass lone star buckle fits 1.5" straps, sold separately.
This buckle measures 2.75" by 2.5".

name: Brass Toro Buckle
description:
Inspired by the rodeo, this buckle is "no bull". Shown here with the scarlet and brown leather belts, you can be a little bit country and a whole lotta rock n roll while wearing the toro.
Constructed by hand from steel, then plated in brass and hand patinated,  this buckle measures about 2.75" long by 2" tall. 
It fits a 1.5" strap, sold separately in the belts section of the store.

name: Scarlet Cuff/ Skinny belt
description:
Classic red color makes this scarlet cuff a versatile accessory.
Two in one, this is a buff? A cult? Wrap around your waist for a ribbon effect, wrap around your wrist multiple times for a layered look. 3/8" wide, this leather accessory looks great either way. Attached to a commercial silver buckle.
When choosing your size, the longer the belt, the more times it will wrap around your wrist. If you are wearing this as a cuff ONLY, go with a smaller size.
Hand made from vegetable tanned leather, and hand dyed with care, this comes in a variety of colors, each color is listed separately.

name: Ochre Leather Belt
description:
This belt I make, by hand, from high quality, strong veggie tanned latigo leather. I HAND DYE the leather with this lovely earthy yellow color, which darkens substantially over time and only gets better.
It has a snapped end, is approx 1.5" wide, and will last for years.
It attaches perfectly to any of the full size buckles on this store.

name: Brass Pointdexter Buckle
description:
Directional design for your waistline.

The pointing hand is a classic ornament, this one in particular is from House Industries' Eames Century Modern font.
http://www.houseind.com/

Catchy, eye catching, and sure to help point you in the right fashion direction, this buckle is hand constructed in steel and meticulously finished in brass. It fits a 1.5" strap, sold separately on my store.

Hook yourself up with a brand spankin new design from Steel Toe Studios, and never lose your way again.

name: Wilbur Buckle
description:
Classic. Refers to the wonderful childhood story, appeals to the farmer and foodie, even the butcher!
Constructed by hand from steel, then copper plated and hand patinated, this buckle measures about 2.75" long by 2" tall. 
It fits a 1.5" strap and is sold separately in the belts section of the store.

name: Copper Trout Buckle
description:
For those who would rather spend your days standing in a river, casting away for the illustrious steelhead, trout and salmon, here is a buckle for you.
Handmade from steel, and copper plated then hand patinated, this buckle shows the trout preparing to jump up for that fly. 
This buckle measures about 2.75" long by 2" tall. 
It fits a 1.5" strap, sold separately in the belts section of the store.

name: Copper Cog Buckle
description:
Brand new for 2012, the cog buckle now comes in a copper finish. Looks great on denim and darker color belts. The buckle is 2.5" in diameter and fairly light weight.
I am producing these in small limited batches, and the picture shown here is to give you an idea of the buckle you will receive, although each cog is slightly different.
Shown in third photo next to brass cog buckle, sold separately on this store. 
Listing is for buckle only, all straps sold separately.

name: BRASS Pebble Lens Buckle
description: Brass plating on forged steel create a really stunning piece. The buckle combines eclipsing rings with round slices, making this is a modern showpiece. Measures 3" in diameter, and fits a 1.5" belt.

name: Checker Buckle
description:
One of the styles that STS has become known for, the Checker buckle has been sold to sophisticated buckle wearers in the US, London and Denmark.
It is created from slices of square steel and treated like a piece of jewelry in construction and finish. Protected with a durable wax, this buckle polishes as it is worn. Looks great with formal wear or jeans, and is lightweight. It measures 3" by 2.25" and is about 1/8" thick.
Get the original checker buckle here, and match it with one of my beautiful hand crafted leather straps. I recommend either black, british tan or ochre. The straps are listed separately, but there is only one shipping cost if you order multiple items.

name: BRASS Checker Buckle
description:
One of the styles that STS has become known for, the Checker buckle has been sold to sophisticated buckle wearers in the US, London and Denmark.
It is created from slices of square steel that are then brass plated, and treated like a piece of jewelry in construction and finish. Protected with a durable wax, this buckle polishes as it is worn. Looks great with formal wear or jeans, and is lightweight. It measures 3" by 2.25" and is about 1/8" thick.
Get the original  BRASS checker buckle here, and match it with one of my beautiful hand crafted leather straps. I recommend either black, british tan or ochre. The straps are listed separately, but there is only one shipping cost if you order multiple items.

name: Brass Bison Buckle
description:
Truly a new take on the western buckle, this brass bison buckle is hand fabricated from steel, brass plated and hand patinated. It is western without being cheesy. 
It measures about 2.75" long by 2" tall. It fits a 1.5" strap, sold separately in the belts section.

name: Robot Ring Buckle
description:
Hey there sputnik! How about this Robot Ring buckle? You can dress it up modern, with high waisted jeans and a pompadour, sing some "tightrope", and you will be one swingin hipster.

Measuring 3" in diameter, made entirely by hand from repurposed steel, this buckle is downright down. It fits up to 1.5" belts.
Shown here with the ochre leather belt, sold separately on this site, this buckle could work with any color we offer.

name: Brass Honey Bees Buckle
description:
Hive mind, hive buckle.  No backyard farm is complete without the beehive. 
Hand fabricated from steel, then brass plated and hand patinated, this buckle is built to last.
The buckle measures 2.75" in length by about 2" tall.
The handmade belts shown in these photos are available separately, in the belts section on the store.

name: Brass Chicken Buckle
description:
Cluck cluck. cock-a-doodle-dooo!
Everybody's got them in their backyards, here's one to put on your pants!
Fresh from the Steel Toe farm, this buckle is handmade from steel,  plated in brass, then hand patinated, and fits a 1.5" belt.
The buckle measures 3" in length by about 2" tall.
The handmade belts shown in these photos are available separately, here on my store.
Free range? Organic? You like your eggs fresh? Then this buckle is for you!

name: Dry Fly Buckle
description:
Made for the flyfisherman and woman, this buckle depicts a royal coachmen dry fly pattern. Perfect for the trout angler, this buckle is hand forged and fabricated in steel and then brass plated giving it a warm brass tone.
Fits a 1.5" belt, sold separately.

name: Graphite Buckle Crosshatched Texture
description:
From a series of buckles based on drawings, I used the hammer to create my shading on this beautiful steel belt buckle. It measures 3.5" in diameter, and looks best when worn to the side, and/or over a sweater or long top. However, I trust that you will know exactly how to rock this statement piece.

Shown on a cherry red leather belt, it looks sharp on any of the leather options here on my store. They are available, and sold separately here.

****Featured in the current issue of American Craft, p.12******

name: Peep Love Buckle
description:
These lil' fellas just hatched, and this buckle is a new addition to the urban farming series. 
Constructed by hand from steel, then brass plated and hand patinated,  this buckle measures about 3" long by 2.25" tall. 
It fits a 1.5" strap which is sold separately in the belts section of this store.

name: Mesh Belt Buckle
description:
Industrial steel screen is transformed into a sleek, modern buckle. It is hand riveted, welded and burnished to a lovely finish.

It measures 3" by 2.25" and is a great weekend buckle, lightweight but makes a strong statement. 

This listing is for the buckle only, please be sure to purchase a strap of your choice separately on my store.

Low profile, but high style!

name: Graphite Buckle Pebbled Texture
description:
From a series of buckles based on drawings, I used the hammer to create my shading on this beautiful steel belt buckle. It measures 3.5" in diameter, and looks best when worn to the side, and/or over a sweater or long top. However, I trust that you will know exactly how to rock this statement piece.

Shown on the plum leather belt, it looks sharp on any of the leather options here on my store. They are available, and sold separately here.

name: Copper Carrot Buckle
description:
What's up doc? This new copper version of the carrot buckle catches attention with its contrasting finishes. Constructed by hand from steel, then plated in copper and hand patinated, this buckle measures about 2.75" long by 2" tall. 
It fits a 1.5" strap, which are sold separately in the belts section.

name: LARGE Recycled Bike Gear Bottle Opener
description:
Yes yes yes, beer drinkers and bikers united in one product.I made it from a portion of a recycled bicycle gear welded to a re-purposed steel bushing. It is oxidized and hot waxed, and totally functional. I also attached a ball chain to it for easy access. It comes in a reusable tin lined with a piece of recycled bicycle tube.
Since I use a variety of types of cogs, each one is different, but appealing. The picture above is to give you an idea of scale and function!

name: Pointdexter Buckle
description:
Directional design for your waistline.

The pointing hand is a classic ornament, this one in particular is from House Industries' Eames Century Modern font.
http://www.houseind.com/

Catchy, eye catching, and sure to help point you in the right fashion direction, this buckle is hand constructed in steel and meticulously finished. It fits a 1.5" strap, sold separately on my store.

Hook yourself up with a brand spankin new design from Steel Toe Studios, and never lose your way again.

name: Narrow Web Buckle
description:
Like a close-up of a spider ladder, this buckle is a low profile, high style accessory. This listing is for the BUCKLE ONLY and is shown here with the brown and ochre leather belts, available separately on this site.
This buckle is perfect for someone who wants some fashion, but not a huge statement. It is the same width as the belt, so it creates a streamlined look, even appropriate for business wear when paired with the black belt.
The Narrow Web buckle measures 3" by 1.5" high, is made from steel, protected with wax and lightweight.

name: Narrow Tread Buckle
description:
Horizontal lines create a flattering look.  This buckle is a low profile, high style accessory. This listing is for the BUCKLE ONLY and is shown here with the brown and ochre leather belts, available separately on this site.
This buckle is perfect for someone who wants some fashion, but not a huge statement. It is the same width as the belt, so it creates a streamlined look, even appropriate for business wear when paired with the black belt.
The Narrow Tread buckle measures 3" by 1.5" high, is made from steel, protected with wax and lightweight.

name: Braveheart Buckle
description:
This is a classic STS buckle, in production since 2003. It is a one liner, and actual little door knocker- yes the ring moves. Mounted on a hand made steel buckle, the brass shines on the mellow blackened steel.
Perfect for leos, those with a sense of humor, and anyone who likes lions.
The buckle fits a 1.5" belt, sold separately on my store.
Shown here on an ochre belt.
Roar!!!

name: Keyhole Buckle
description:
Key to my heart, belt, pants, wait, what????
This buckle is a classic STS design, and never seems to lose its appeal. A repurposed, reclaimed keyhole is carefully hand riveted to a handmade steel buckle with a lovely patina. Since I make each of these by hand, the texture and keyhole will vary slightly from buckle to buckle, but each is always made with a huge amount of attention paid to the tiny details..
Shown here with leather belts, it looks great on any of my handmade straps available on this site.
Measures 2.25" high by 2.75" long, fits a 1.5" strap.

name: Brass Water Ring Buckle
description:
Forged rings of brass plated steel create this simple, sexy buckle. Measures 2 and 3/4" in diameter (varies slightly due to hand forging).
 Straps sold separately. Buckle fits 1.5' wide strap.

name: Brass Man Sham
description:
Now available in a brass plated finish, the man sham has a lovely warm tone. Here it is, a full sized, steel, stylized shamrock buckle that fits a 1.5" strap. Now you can get both the full sized and the small one, sold as the shamrock buckle, and double your luck!
The textures vary from what you see in this picture to less textured- the forge determines this pattern.

name: Narrow Radiator Buckle
description:
A streamlined version of a larger buckle, this slick steel buckle measures 3" by 1.5" and fits onto a 1.5" belt.
This listing is for the buckle only, please be sure to purchase a strap of your choice separately on my store. It is shown here on one of my hand made, high quality, black leather snap belts.
It is hand riveted, welded and burnished to a lovely finish.
Low profile, but high style!

name: Narrow Robot
description:
A streamlined version of a larger buckle, this slick steel buckle measures 3" by 1.5" and fits onto a 1.5" belt.
This listing is for the buckle only, please be sure to purchase a strap of your choice separately on my store. It is shown here on one of my hand dyed, british tan leather snap belts.
It is hand riveted, welded and burnished to a lovely finish.
Low profile, but high style!

name: Robot Belt Buckle
description:
The Robot is here! This is the full size version of the buckle. retro techno steel buckle measures 3" by 2.25" and fits onto a 1.5" belt.
This listing is for the buckle only, please be sure to purchase a strap of your choice separately on my store. It is shown here on one of my hand made, high quality, brown leather snap belts.
It is hand riveted, welded and burnished to a lovely finish.
Low profile, but high style!

name: Brass Tunnel
description:
Three tunneling rings make this simple buckle a classic but modern accessory for any outfit. It measures 3.25" by 2.5" tall, and fits onto a 1.5" strap, sold separately, here on my store. !!!!THIS LISTING IS FOR THE BUCKLE ONLY!!!
It is shown with one of my black Italian leather hand made belts, available for $44 and listed separately.
Made from steel and then brass plated, I hand finish the buckle to this mellow, darkened patina. It will polish over time as you wear it, only getting more lovely!
This can be worn through belt loops, or use it to pull in a tunic or long t-shirt.

The last photos show the scale difference between this listing for the Brass Tunnel, and the mini version, the MINI brass tunnel, which fits on a 1" belt.
Get em both and be stylishly redundant.

name: MAN SHAM Buckle
description:
Here it is- the man sham, a full sized, steel, stylized shamrock buckle that fits a 1.5" strap. Now you can get both the full sized and the small one, sold as the shamrock buckle, and double your luck!
The textures vary from what you see in this picture to less textured- the forge determines this pattern.

name: Mini Brass Tunnel
description:
Measuring about two inches long, and fits  a one inch wide belt, sold separately, this little number adds a touch of class to any outfit. (and by class, I mean dressing like you care!)
Made from steel and then brass plated, I hand finish the buckle to this mellow, darkened patina. It will polish over time as you wear it, only getting more lovely!
This can be worn through belt loops, or use it to pull in a tunic or long t-shirt.

name: Lens Buckle
description:
Eclipsing steel rings create this ocular buckle. Measures 3" in diameter, fits 1.5" belt. Straps sold separately on this site.
Listing is for buckle only, second photo shown with ochre belt underneath pebble lens buckle.

name: Pebble Lens Buckle
description: Forged steel buckle combining eclipsing rings with round slices, this is a modern showpiece. Measures 3" in diameter, and fits a 1.5" belt.

name: Narrow 1" BLACK belt
description:
Black, lighter weight latigo leather, this belt measures one inch wide and fits the smaller buckles on this store.
It closes with a snap attachment, so buckles can be removed and interchanged very easily.

name: Narrow 1" RHUBARB  belt
description:
Hand dyed vegetable tanned leather, this belt measures one inch wide and fits the smaller buckles on this store.
It closes with a snap attachment, so buckles can be removed and interchanged very easily.

name: Narrow 1" BRITISH TAN belt
description:
Hand dyed vegetable tanned leather, this belt measures one inch wide and fits the smaller buckles on this store.
It closes with a snap attachment, so buckles can be removed and interchanged very easily.

name: Narrow 1" SCARLET Leather Belt
description:
Hand dyed vegetable tanned leather, this belt measures one inch wide and fits the smaller buckles on this store.
It closes with a snap attachment, so buckles can be removed and interchanged very easily.

name: Narrow 1" Green Leather Belt
description:
Hand dyed vegetable tanned leather, this belt measures one inch wide and fits the smaller buckles on this store. 
It closes with a snap attachment, so buckles can be removed and interchanged very easily.

name: Mini Shamrock Buckle
description:
This steel shamrock buckle will slyly garner you the luck you desire.

Sold SOLO, this buckle fits a 1" belt, shown here on a leaf green leather strap.

You can BUY the strap SEPARATELY here on my store.
This buckle is hand fabricated from steel in my studio in Seattle.

name: Brass Super Cog
description:
Bicycle cogs get an entirely new identity in this bold, brass buckle. Made from recycled bike cogs and repurposed hardware,
the buckle measures 3" in diameter, and fits a 1.5" wide belt.

This looks especially lovely with the recycled bike tube belt as it picks up the color of the stitching. THis listing is for the BUCKLE ONLY! You can order belts on my store, no extra shipping will be charged.

I am producing these in small limited batches, and the picture shown here is to give you an idea of the buckle you will receive, although each one is slightly different.

******In the fourth photo, this listing is for the LARGER buckle shown on the left on the recycled tube belt. The smaller, brass cog on the white belt is listed separately under BRASS COG BUCKLE **********************

name: Scarlet Leather Snap Belt
description:
This listing is for the leather strap ONLY. Scarlet is a rich, classic red tone that looks fantastic with any of my buckles, particularly the brass finish.  I make each one by hand, and I pay attention to all the details, the edges are beveled, dyed and each one is truly lovely. It is 1.5" in width. The snap attachments means you can swap a different buckle on and off, and get more use out of your belt. Can be ordered in various sizes, these are pants sizes:

S - 26-30
M - 30-36
L - 36-40
XL - 40-46
XXL - 46-50

And custom sizes cost NO additional charge, but please allow an extra week for shipping.. note the size required in the payment or convo me to determine your best length.

name: Lone Star Buckle
description:
A bold combo of star and stripes, this buckle holds down the pants fort with style.
Hand fabricated from steel, the lone star buckle fits 1.5" straps, sold separately.
This buckle measures 2.75" by 2.5".

name: Grill Buckle
description:
Grill as in you'd better get out of the way, that truck's gonna mow you down. Reminiscent of a 70's pickup's front grill, this buckle is a low profile, high style accessory.This listing is for the BUCKLE ONLY and is shown here with the brown and ochre leather belts, available separately on this site.
This buckle is perfect for someone who wants some fashion, but not a huge statement. It is the same width as the belt, so it creates a streamlined look, even appropriate for business wear when paired with the black belt.
The Grill buckle measures 3" by 1.5" high, is made from steel, protected with wax and lightweight.

name: BRASS Pebble Buckle
description:
A classic STS design, this brass plated steel buckle is modern, versatile, and just really cool!
Created from individually sawed pieces of steel, the buckle boasts both strong composition and subtle texture for those who get a closer look. It has been brass plated and hand patinated, giving it a warm, dark brass tone.
This listing is for the BRASS version, a steel version is sold under Pebbles listing.
Fits a 1.5" belt, sold separately here on the store.
Measures approx 3" by 2.5".

name: Pebble Buckle
description:
A classic STS design, this steel buckle is modern, versatile, and just really cool!
Created from individually sawed pieces of steel, the buckle boasts both strong composition and subtle texture for those who get a closer look.
This listing is for the steel version, a brass plated version is sold under the Brass pebbles listing.

Fits a 1.5" belt, sold separately here on the store.
Measures approx 3" by 2.5".

It is packaged in a reusable linen drawstring bag.

name: Ochre Cuff/Skinny Belt
description:
Two in one, this is a buff? A cult? Wrap around your waist for a ribbon effect, wrap around your wrist multiple times for a layered look. 3/8" wide, this leather accessory looks great either way. Attached to a commercial silver buckle.
When choosing your size, the longer the belt, the more times it will wrap around your wrist. If you are wearing this as a cuff ONLY, go with a smaller size.
Hand made from vegetable tanned leather, and hand dyed with care, this comes in a variety of colors, each color is listed separately.

name: Rhubarb skinny belt/cuff
description:
Two in one, this is a buff? A cult? Wrap around your waist for a ribbon effect, wrap around your wrist multiple times for a layered look. 3/8" wide, this leather accessory looks great either way. Attached to a commercial silver buckle.
When choosing your size, the longer the belt, the more times it will wrap around your wrist. If you are wearing this as a cuff ONLY, go with a smaller size.
Hand made from vegetable tanned leather, and hand dyed with care, this comes in a variety of colors, each color is listed separately.

name: Brass Cog Buckle
description:
I have brass plated the recycled bike cog buckle, using cogs without cutouts, hand finished the brass, and voila! This looks especially lovely with the recycled bike tube belt as it picks up the color of the stitching. The buckle is 2.5" in diameter and fairly light weight.
I am producing these in small limited batches, and the picture shown here is to give you an idea of the buckle you will receive, although each one is slightly different.
******This listing is for the buckle shown on the right, on the white belt, and is the smaller of the two buckles PLease refer to the BRASS SUPER COG listing to purchase the larger buckle shown on the left********
The buckle fits a 1.5" belt.

name: Narrow Mesh Buckle
description:
Industrial steel screen is transformed into a sleek, modern buckle. It is hand riveted, welded and burnished to a lovely finish.
This steel buckle measures 3" by 1.5" and fits onto a 1.5" belt.
This listing is for the buckle only, please be sure to purchase a strap of your choice separately on my store. It is shown here on one of my hand dyed, ochre leather snap belts.

Low profile, but high style!

name: Tread Buckle
description:
The Tread is a slick, masculine buckle that is really flattering and modern.
This listing is for the BUCKLE ONLY and is shown here with the black and ochre leather belts, available separately on this site.
A great jeans buckle, this has enough size for a tall guy to wear it without it looking out of scale. And hey ladies, you can rock this one too if you got the look!
The tread buckle measures 3" long by 2.25" high, is made from steel, protected with wax, and lightweight.

name: Brass Satellite Buckle
description:
Forged and fabricated using a recycled bike cog, textured steel and steel hardware, this buckle has been brass plated and patinated.
A new popular buckle, the Brass satellite is a little bit bike-y, a little bit steampunk, and a little bit retro future!
It fits a 1.5" belt, sold separately on my store. This listing is for the buckle only. It is shown here on one of my black Italian leather handmade straps.
3" in diameter, this is the same size as the supercog buckle.
Each one varies due to slight differences in cog style, the last picture shows some of this variation.

name: Bespoke Initial Buckle RADIATOR
description:
Hey there fancy pants, this buckle is for you!

Bespoke as bespoke can be, YOU choose BOTH your LETTER and BACKGROUND PATTERN, resulting in a buckle that is undeniably yours. No one is gonna "borrow" this one, unless they happen to go by the same letter.

THIS LISTING IS FOR THE QUATREFOIL/RADIATOR BACKGROUND, other patterns are listed separately.
Using the font Eames Century Modern from font factory House Industries,
http://www.houseind.com/
the initials are currently available in uppercase bold.

The buckle measures 3" by 2.25" and fits a 1.5" strap, which are sold SEPARATELY on my store.
Each buckle is handmade to order, so please allow 17 days from date of order to ship date.

Please indicate your chosen letter and background in the note to seller, and I will email a confirmation.

name: Bespoke Initial Buckle ROBOT
description:
Hey there fancy pants, this buckle is for you!

Bespoke as bespoke can be, YOU choose BOTH your LETTER and BACKGROUND PATTERN, resulting in a buckle that is undeniably yours. No one is gonna "borrow" this one, unless they happen to go by the same letter.

THIS LISTING IS FOR THE ROBOT BACKGROUND, other patterns are listed separately.

Elaborate patterns combined with a bold, slab serif font, this STS buckle is a stunner.

Using the font Eames Century Modern from font factory House Industries,
http://www.houseind.com/

the initials are currently available in uppercase bold.

The buckle measures 3" by 2.25" and fits a 1.5" strap, which are sold SEPARATELY on my store.

Please indicate your chosen letter and background in the note to seller, and I will email a confirmation.

name: Steel Satellite Buckle
description:
Forged and fabricated using a recycled bike cog, textured steel and steel hardware, this buckle has been hand patinaed and burnished to a mellow finish.
A new popular buckle, the steel satellite is a little bit bike-y, a little bit steampunk, and a little bit retro future!
It fits a 1.5" belt, sold separately on my store. 
3" in diameter, this is the same size as the supercog buckle.
Each one varies due to slight differences in cog style.

name: Grass Green Leather Belt
description:
This listing is for the leather strap ONLY. Grass green is a beautiful, natural shade of green that I use to hand dye the vegetable tanned leather. It darkens with time and wear, and looks awesome with the buckles available here. I make each one by hand, and I pay attention to all the details, the edges are beveled, dyed and each one is truly lovely. It is 1.5" in width. The snap attachments means you can swap a different buckle on and off, and get more use out of your belt.

And custom sizes cost NO additional charge, but please allow an extra week for shipping.. note the size required in the payment or email me to determine your best length.

name: Brown Italian Leather Belt
description:
This listing is for the leather strap ONLY. I use high quality, Italian latigo leather. It is a rich brown, and the leather has a buttery quality, while being heavy weight. I make each one by hand, and I pay attention to all the details, the edges are beveled, dyed and each one is truly lovely. It is 1.5" in width. The snap attachments means you can swap a different buckle on and off, and get more use out of your belt. 

And custom sizes cost NO additional charge, but please allow an extra week for shipping.. note the size required in the payment or email me to determine your best length.

name: Rhubarb Leather Belt
description:
This listing is for the leather strap ONLY. Plum is a beautiful, natural shade of purple that I use to hand dye the vegetable tanned leather. It darkens with time and wear, and looks awesome with the buckles available here. I make each one by hand, and I pay attention to all the details, the edges are beveled, dyed and each one is truly lovely. It is 1.5" in width. The snap attachments means you can swap a different buckle on and off, and get more use out of your belt. Can be ordered in various sizes, these are pants sizes:


Custom sizes cost NO additional charge, but please allow an extra week for shipping.. note the size required in the payment or convo me to determine your best length.

name: British Tan Leather Belt
description:
This listing is for the leather strap ONLY. British tan is an earthy rust tone and I streak the dye to create texture. It darkens with time and wear, and looks awesome with the buckles available here. I make each one by hand, and I pay attention to all the details, the edges are beveled, dyed and each one is truly lovely. It is 1.5" in width. The snap attachments means you can swap a different buckle on and off, and get more use out of your belt.

And custom sizes cost NO additional charge, but please allow an extra week for shipping.. note the size required in the payment or email me to determine your best length.

name: Cog Bottle Opener Buckle
description:
Well, the title pretty much says it all. This is the same diameter as the cog buckle, 2.5" wide, and not only holds your pants up, but can also open up a bottle. LISTING IS FOR BUCKLE ONLY, IT IS SHOWN ON THE RECYCLED BIKE TUBE BELT AVAILABLE SEPARATELY ON THIS SITE.(See the cyclone bottle opener for images of how to open a bottle with it).
An eternally hot seller, this buckle takes care of your biker, beer drinker, pants wearing friends. Each one is different, as I use different used gears, the pictures are to give you an idea of what yours will look like!

Fits belts up to 1.5"wide, looks great with the recycled tube belt available on this site for no extra shipping charge!

name: Super Cog Buckle
description:
We make these buckles from a used bike cog and an industrial bushing. Each one is slightly different since each piece is recycled, if you buy this one, the buckle in this photo is a representation of what you will be sent. Each one is hand finished and lovely, industrial and modern. Sturdy, will hold up to extreme wear, and super stylie! Almost three inches in diameter, but quite light.
This buckle fits a 1.5" belt, which are sold separately!

name: Mega Monkey Buckle
description:
FINALLY!!! The wait is over. After many, many, many requests for an adult sized monkey buckle, I took the munchkin monkey buckle, blew it up, added some more character, et voila!
It is cast in small batches from pewter, fits a 1.5" belt, and is darn cute! The overall dimensions are approx 3.5" ear to ear, 2.5" top of head to bottom of head.

DO YOU NEED A STRAP TO GO WITH IT?
CHECK my listings for handmade leather straps or recycled bike tube straps! 
If you are interested in a mini monkey, please check out the separate listing.

name: CUSTOM Number Buckle
description:
Lucky number? Special year? Anniversary? Pick your favorite number, one to two digits, and I will make you your own beautiful steel belt buckle.
With special permission from the super stylin font factory, House Industries,
http://www.houseind.com/
the numerals used are of their Eames Century Modern font.
Bold, sexy, and diligently designed, this buckle will rock your pants and potentially your world. Well, at least your wardrobe.

This listing is for the buckle only, please choose a strap from my store and purchase separately.

Buckle fits 1.5" strap.

********Note your chosen number on the note to seller, and I will confirm with an email. *********

Since these are bespoke, and I will be making each one as it is ordered, please allow 17 days between placing the order and the ship date.

name: Cog Buckle
description: Sweeet belt buckle made from recycled bike cog and repurposed steel with my hands and my hammer.  Fits 1.5in. belt, each cog slightly different! the buckle is 2.5in. diameter.

name: Recycled Vegan Bike Tube Snap Belt
description: Double stuffed, recycled bike tubes with four lines of top stitching in a lemon yellow sturdy thread, it attaches with two heavy duty snaps to your favorite buckle, or to our buckles. Super stylie, comfortable and rugged, we say, wear your spare in pride!!

name: Multifont Buckle
description: Get your type on! This is a new buckle cast from actual letterpress pieces. Perfect for all those font freaks in your life. Try it with the brand new recycled rubber belt, sold separately. It is about 2.75” long by 2” tall.
